price: (62) [This is] the established way of Allāh with those who passed on before; and you will not find in the way of Allāh any change.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi fī alladhīna khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
